directions: Mix lemonade, grapefruit vodka, grapefruit juice, lemon vodka, and cranberry juice together in a pitcher. Pour mixture into 4 martini glasses.
ingredients: 3 fluid ounces grapefruit-flavored vodka (such as Absolut Ruby Red®)
2 fluid ounces lemon-flavored vodka (such as Absolut Citron®)
title: Grapefruit Martini
